title: (x) "Clarify with" italic humanist sans/serif face - Gill Sans/ITC Stone Serif {Michael A/Florian, Jan E}
content:
please identify the font...

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20080208230159im_/http:/www.typophile.com/files/font_3746.jpg)

 [‹ (x) Flared Art Nouveau font on "Monsieur" book cover - Hercules/Herkules {Mike F}](http://web.archive.org/web/20080208230159/http:/www.typophile.com/node/36715 "Go to previous forum topic") [(x) News Scan tech sans - ITC Conduit {Antonio Cavedoni} ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20080208230159/http:/www.typophile.com/node/36708 "Go to next forum topic")
author: hetanshi

comments.content: That would be Gill Sans.
and which would this font be??
[file:///Users/Hetanshi/Desktop/font%202.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20080208230159/http:/www.typophile.com/Users/Hetanshi/Desktop/font%202.jpg "///Users/Hetanshi/Desktop/font%202.jpg")
The link doesn’t work; it’s a direct link to your desktop. ;^)
ya i don knw how to put up the image here... it says error copying the image...
and what would this fint be??
and what would this font be??
![](http://web.archive.org/web/20080208230159im_/http:/www.typophile.com/files/111_4229.jpg)
Stone Serif Italic.
That’s [ITC Stone Serif Medium Italic](http://web.archive.org/web/20080208230159/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/linotype/itc-stone-serif/).
… by Sumner Stone; [available here](http://web.archive.org/web/20080208230159/http:/www.stonetypefoundry.com/itcstoneserif.html), for instance.
Oh man. Late again.
Oh yeah—Medium … :°D
Hey Hetanshi, if you happen to have another one, would you mind starting a new thread for it? Thanks …

![](http://web.archive.org/web/20080208230159im_/http:/www.typophile.com/files/body_4302.jpg)
  
please help identify this one also

![](http://web.archive.org/web/20080208230159im_/http:/www.typophile.com/files/body_4302.jpg)
  
please help identify this one also
Man … that’s Stone Serif Regular!
thanx a ton to all.... thanx so much for the help....

Looking at the blueish bg colour and the words, I’d say those sample even are from the same source.

You’re welcome.

hetanshi helpme out tool...identifying this font

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20080208230159im_/http:/www.typophile.com/files/dheema2c%20copy_6501.jpg)

dheera.  
If you post this as a new topic I’ll tell you what it is.

Solved in the other thread that was posted on the Design Board. Dheera, first please don’t hijack other people’s thread as Jan asked, it’s bad form. Second please post all identification requests in this area, not on other boards like Design.
